annotations.description: The Left Hand was created by Sam Ross of Milk & Honey and Attaboy around 2006. It is a fantastic Negroni Variation utilizing Bourbon and Chocolate Bitters an...
annotations.title: On The Origins Of Double Fisting With My Left and Right Hand

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Jamaica Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Campari
.75oz (22.5ml) Sweet Vermouth
8 Drops Chocolate Bitters
Orange Twist

Stir and strain into coupe

title: Right Hand
